001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear.main;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Threads;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.SyntheticDataSets;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Notations;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearBasisFunctionModel;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearRegression;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis.BasisFunction;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis.PolynomialFunction;
012import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.optimizer.L2RegularizedClosedSolutionOptimizer;
013import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
014import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.Regimes;
015import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.Plot;
016
017import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
018import java.util.Map;
019
020public class ModelVariance {
021
022    public static void main(String[] args) {
023        useNumberType(JavaNumberTypeSupport.RATIONAL_BIGINT, 25, 8, 9, 0);
024    }
025
026    private static <N extends Number> void useNumberType(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport, int count, double regularizationLog10, int m, long sleep) {
027        Plot weightsPlot = new Plot("Total Absolute Weights");
028        weightsPlot.getChart().setXAxisTitle("iteration");
029        weightsPlot.display();
030
031        Plot mrePlot = new Plot("RME");
032        mrePlot.getChart().setXAxisTitle("iteration");
033        mrePlot.display();
034
035        Plot fitPlot = new Plot("Variance vs Regularization");
036        fitPlot.plotTargetOutput(SyntheticDataSets.sinus(typeSupport).getEstimationFunction(), "Target");
037        fitPlot.setYRange(-2.0, 2.0);
038        fitPlot.display();
039
040        N lambda = typeSupport.one();
041        N e = typeSupport.valueOf(10);
042        for (int i = 0; i < regularizationLog10; i++) {
043            lambda = typeSupport.divide(lambda, e);
044        }
045        for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
046            Threads.sleepSilently(sleep);
047
048            String name = "log10(" + Notations.LAMBDA + ") = -" + regularizationLog10;
049            System.out.println(i + ": " + name);
050            LinearRegression<N> regression = createClosedSolutionFitting(typeSupport);
051            ((L2RegularizedClosedSolutionOptimizer<N>) regression.getOptimizer()).setLambda(lambda);
052            LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> model = regression.fitComplexity(m);
053
054            fitPlot.plotTargetOutput(model, "Regularized Fit");
055            Pair<Float, Map<String, Float>> currentRmes = regression.calculateRMEs(model);
056            mrePlot.addToSeries("Train RME", new float[]{i}, new float[]{currentRmes.left()});
057            for (Map.Entry<String, Float> currentRmeEntry : currentRmes.right().entrySet()) {
058                mrePlot.addToSeries(currentRmeEntry.getKey() + " RME", new float[]{i}, new float[]{currentRmeEntry.getValue()});
059            }
060            float totalWeights = 0.0f;
061            for (int p = 0; p < model.getParameterCount(); p++) {
062                totalWeights += typeSupport.absolute(model.getParameter(p)).floatValue();
063            }
064            weightsPlot.addToSeries("Total Weights", new float[]{i}, new float[]{totalWeights});
065            fitPlot.getChart().setTitle(name);
066            fitPlot.redraw();
067            mrePlot.redraw();
068            weightsPlot.redraw();
069        }
070    }
071
072    private static <N extends Number> LinearRegression<N> createClosedSolutionFitting(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
073        SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<N> dataSetGenerator = SyntheticDataSets.sinus(typeSupport);
074        BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator = new PolynomialFunction.Generator<>(typeSupport);
075        return create(dataSetGenerator, basisFunctionGenerator);
076    }
077
078    public static <N extends Number> LinearRegression<N> create(SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<N> dataSetGenerator, BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator) {
079        dataSetGenerator.setNoiseScale(0.5f);
080        DataSet<N> trainSet = dataSetGenerator.load(10);
081        DataSet<N> testSet = dataSetGenerator.load(1000);
082        Map<String, DataSet<N>> testSets = new LinkedHashMap<>();
083        testSets.put("Test Set", testSet);
084        return new LinearRegression<>(basisFunctionGenerator, trainSet, testSets, new L2RegularizedClosedSolutionOptimizer<>(basisFunctionGenerator.getCurrentNumberType()), Regimes.oneShot());
085    }
086
087}
